summary.span: 表示一个由可移动条组成的控件，该可移动条将容器的显示区域分成两个大小可调的面板。

span.span: Represents a control consisting of a movable bar that divides a container's display area into two resizable panels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将控件添加到这两个大小可调的面板，还可以将其他 控件添加到现有 面板，以创建多个可调整大小的显示区域。You can add controls to the two resizable panels, and you can add other controls to existing panels to create many resizable display areas. 使用 控件将容器的显示区域除以 (如 ) ，并允许用户调整添加到面板的控件的大小 。Use the control to divide the display area of a container (such as a ) and allow the user to resize controls that are added to the panels. 当用户将鼠标指针传递到拆分器上方时，光标将发生变化，以指示可以调整控件内的控件的 大小。When the user passes the mouse pointer over the splitter, the cursor changes to indicate that the controls inside the control can be resized. > [!NOTE] > 的早期版本 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 仅支持 控件。Previous versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] only support the control. 还简化了设计时的控件放置。 also eases control placement at design time. 例如，若要创建类似于 Windows 资源管理器的窗口，请将 控件添加到， 并将其 属性设置为 `DockStyle.Fill` 。For example, to create a window similar to Windows Explorer, add a control to a and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill`. 向添加一个 控件 ，并将其 属性设置为 `DockStyle.Fill` 。Add a control to the and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill`. 若要完成布局，请添加一个 控件，并将其 属性设置为 `DockStyle.Fill` ，以使 占用剩余的空间 。To complete the layout, add a control and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill` to have the occupy the remaining space on the . 在运行时，用户可以使用拆分器来调整两个控件的宽度。At run time, the user can then resize the width of both controls using the splitter. 使用 属性指定控件不应与 或其他容器一起调整大小。Use the property to specify that a control should not be resized along with the or other container. 用于 指定拆分器在窗体上的起始位置。Use to specify where the splitter starts on your form. 用于 指定拆分器一次移动的像素数。Use to specify how many pixels the splitter moves at a time. 的默认值 为一个像素。The default for is one pixel. 使用 和 指定如何将拆分条移动到面板的外边缘 。Use and to specify how close the splitter bar can be moved to the outside edge of a panel. 面板的默认最小大小为25像素。The default minimum size of a panel is 25 pixels. 使用 属性指定水平方向。Use the property to specify horizontal orientation. 的默认方向 为垂直方向。The default orientation of the is vertical. 使用 属性指定边框样式 ，并使用您添加到中的控件的边框样式来协调边框样式 。Use the property to specify the border style of the and coordinate its border style with the border style of controls that you add to the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了垂直和水平 。The following code example shows both a vertical and horizontal . 垂直拆分器以10像素为增量移动。The vertical splitter moves in 10-pixel increments. 垂直的左侧面板 包含一个 控件，其右侧面板包含一个水平 。The left panel of the vertical contains a control, and its right panel contains a horizontal . 这两个水平面板 均使用 控件填充，顶部面板定义为， 以便在调整容器大小时不调整大小。Both panels of the horizontal are filled with controls, and the top panel is defined as a so that it does not resize when you resize the container. 移动垂直拆分器将引发 事件，在此示例中通过对游标样式的更改表示。Moving the vertical splitter raises the event, signified in this example by a change to the cursor style. 停止移动拆分器时，将引发事件。The event is raised when you stop moving the splitter. 在此示例中，游标样式将还原为默认值。This is signified in this example by the cursor style reverting to the default. summary.span: 获取或设置自动滚动边距的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the auto-scroll margin.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.

value.span: 一个 值，它表示自动滚动边距的高度和宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: A value that represents the height and width, in pixels, of the auto-scroll margin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动滚动边距是任何子控件和可滚动父控件边缘之间的距离。The auto-scroll margin is the distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control. 将 大小添加到可滚动控件中包含的任何子控件的大小，以确定是否需要滚动条。The size is added to the size of any child controls contained in the scrollable control to determine if scroll bars are needed. 当调整父可滚动控件的大小时，或将各个子控件置于视图中时，将计算属性，并使用来确定是否必须显示滚动条。The property is evaluated when the parent scrollable control is resized or the individual child controls are brought into view, and is used to determine if scroll bars must be displayed. 停靠控件从确定是否必须显示滚动条的计算中排除。Docked controls are excluded from the calculations that determine if scroll bars must be displayed. 如果从子控件的边缘到父可滚动控件的距离小于分配给该属性的值， 并且 属性设置为 `true` ，则会显示相应的滚动条。If the distance from the edge of a child control to the parent scrollable control is less than the value assigned to the property and the property is set to `true`, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed. 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant to this class.

value.span: 如果自动调整 的大小，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的内容可能因多种原因而变化;包括显示数据更改;子控件的添加;布局和填充更改;或系统字体、语言或分辨率发生更改。The contents of a control may change for many reasons; including display data changes; addition of child controls; layout and padding changes; or system font, language, or resolution changes. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则 将自动调整大小以包含其内容，但不会将其大小调整为小于其原始内容 。If the property is set to `true`, the will resize automatically to encompass its contents, although it will never be resized to be smaller than its original . 此操作将维护控件的 。This operation will maintain the control's . 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant to this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 编程修改或用户交互更改了属性，则会引发此事件。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `SplitContainer1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置附加到容器边缘的 边框。

span.span: Gets or sets which borders are attached to the edges of the container.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将定位 到其容器的任何边缘，或者可以将定位 到容器的所有边缘，以 完全填充容器。You can dock a to any edge of its container, or you can dock a to all edges of the container so that the entirely fills the container. 例如，如果将此属性设置为， 则将的左边缘附加 到其容器的左边缘。For example, set this property to to attach the left edge of the to the left edge of its container. 控件按 z 顺序停靠。Controls are docked in z-order. > [!NOTE] > Z 顺序对应于屏幕的深度维度，x 顺序和 y 顺序分别对应于水平和垂直尺寸。The z-order corresponds to the depth dimension of the screen, and the x-order and y-order corresponds to the horizontal and vertical dimensions, respectively. Z 顺序定义在控件或窗口可能在屏幕上重叠或占据相同空间的情况下显示的对象。Z-order defines which object appears in front of which, in cases where controls or windows can overlap or occupy the same space on the screen. 位于 z 顺序顶部的控件或窗口将出现在所有其他控件或窗口的顶部，并在属性中由0的索引引用 。A control or window at the top of the z-order appears on top of all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of 0 in the property. 位于 z 顺序底部的控件或窗口出现在所有其他控件或窗口下，并由属性中的索引引用 `(Controls.Count-1)` 。A control or window at the bottom of the z-order appears underneath all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of `(Controls.Count-1)` in the property. 有关锚定和停靠控件的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：使用 Windows 窗体创建多窗格用户界面](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-multipane-user-interface-with-windows-forms)。For more information about anchoring and docking controls, see [How to: Create a Multipane User Interface with Windows Forms](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-multipane-user-interface-with-windows-forms). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个垂直拆分器，其 属性设置为 `Fill` 。The following code example shows a vertical splitter whose property is set to `Fill`. 还显示了垂直拆分器的其他基本属性。Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息预处理过程中，将调用此方法来处理对话框键字符，如选项卡、向左键、向右键、向上键和向下键。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box key characters, such as TAB, LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW, UP ARROW, and DOWN ARROW. 不处理包含 ALT 或控件修饰符的键。Keys that include the ALT or CONTROL modifiers are not handled. 仅当 方法指示控件未处理该键时，才调用此方法。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the key. 只是将字符发送到父级的 方法， `false` 如果控件没有父级，则返回。The simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 类将重写此方法以执行对话框键的实际处理。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys. 仅当控件承载于 Windows 窗体应用程序或 ActiveX 控件中时，运行时才会调用此方法。The run time calls this method only when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.

para.span: 当在 派生类中重写方法时，控件应返回 以指示它已处理该键。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, a control should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 对于不是由控件处理的键，应返回调用基类的方法的结果 。

span.span: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's method should be returned.

para.span: 控件很少需要重写此方法（如果需要）。

span.span: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于 获取拆分器相对于的宽度和高度 。Use to get the width and height of the splitter relative to the . 、、 、 和 事件处理程序在 移动时，绘制以显示拆分器的当前位置。The , , , , and event handlers draw the to show the current position of the splitter while it is moving. 值的含义 因而异 。The meaning of the values vary depending on the . 的输出 采用格式 `{X, Y, Width, Height}` 。The output of is in the format `{X, Y, Width, Height}`. 下表显示了 垂直和水平拆分器的值的含义。The following table shows the meaning of the values for vertical and horizontal splitters. |维度Dimension|垂直拆分器Vertical Splitter|水平拆分器Horizontal Splitter| |---------------|-----------------------|-------------------------| |XX|拆分器与的左边缘之间的距离（以像素为单位） 。The distance in pixels of the splitter from the left edge of the .|对于水平拆分器，此值始终为0，指示拆分器与的左边缘齐平 。This value is always 0 for a horizontal splitter, indicating that the splitter is flush with the left edge of the .| |是Y|对于垂直拆分器，此值始终为0，指示拆分器与的上边缘对齐 。This value is always 0 for a vertical splitter, indicating that the splitter is flush with the top edge of the .|拆分器与的上边缘之间的距离（以像素为单位） 。The distance in pixels of the splitter from the top edge of the .| |宽度Width|拆分器的宽度。The width of the splitter.|拆分器的高度，它等效于控件的高度 。The height of the splitter, which is equivalent to the height of the control.| |高度Height|拆分器的高度，它等效于控件的高度 。The height of the splitter, which is equivalent to the height of the control.|拆分器的宽度。The width of the splitter.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按 TAB 键时，输入焦点设置为窗体的 TAB 键顺序中的下一个控件。When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order of the form. 设置 为可以将 `true` 输入焦点提供给拆分器，以便可以使用箭头键和鼠标移动。Set to `true` to give input focus to a splitter so that it can be moved with the arrow keys as well as with the mouse. 从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ，将设置 为 `false` 从 tab 键顺序中的控件集合中排除拆分器和中包含的任何控件。Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], setting to `false` excludes the splitter and any of the controls that are contained in the from the collection of controls in the tab order. 若要启用控件以通过使用 TAB 键获取焦点，请创建一个从继承的控件 。To enable controls to get focus by using the TAB key, create a control that inherits from . 创建一个名为的新属性 `TabStop` ，并重写 方法。Create a new property named `TabStop` and override the method. 下面的示例演示如何实现此目的。The following example demonstrates how to accomplish this. [!code-csharp[SplitContainerTabStop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/splitcontainertabstop/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SplitContainerTabStop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/splitcontainertabstop/vb/module1.vb#1)] 您可以通过设置控件的属性值来操作 tab 键顺序 。You can manipulate the tab order by setting the control's property value.

Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过方法进行筛选后，所有消息都将发送到 方法 。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅 [WindowProc 函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/legacy/ms633573(v=vs.85))。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the [WindowProc function](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/legacy/ms633573(v=vs.85)).

para.span: 继承控件应调用基类的 方法来处理其不处理的所有消息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the base class's method to process any messages that they do not handle.
